channel.title: Tram at start gets fliped in 3rd map
channel.description: The tram at the beginning of the game gets flipped around the only way to tell is from the props inside. What I would do is flip the tram the first 2 maps so that it looks the same the whole ride.

item.title: Tram at start gets fliped in 3rd map
item.dc:creator: Max15946
item.description:
The tram at the beginning of the game gets flipped around the only way to tell is from the props inside. What I would do is flip the tram the first 2 maps so that it looks the same the whole ride.
